revised_title: Monoclinic Double Selenates of the Cobalt Group: Crystallographic Properties and Optical Characteristics
tldr: This study investigates the crystallographic properties and optical characteristics of four double selenates in the cobalt group, including potassium, rubidium, cesium, and ammonium salts. The research focuses on their crystal systems, interfacial angles, refractive indices, and optical axial angles, providing valuable insights into the physical properties of these compounds.
